item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
Tory MP Brown hosts sixth annual Hockey Night in Barrie charity fundraiser ...
Hello out there, we're on the air: Conservative MP Patrick Brown has helped raise more than $850,000 for his local hospital and hopes to surpass the $1.1-million mark at this Thursday's Hockey Night in Barrie game. This year's proceeds will go toward ...

item.description:
Feds support Barrie's Canada Day party
On behalf of the federal government, Barrie MP Patrick Brown gave $43,500 for fireworks, events and entertainment in celebration of Canada's birthday. "This grant allows residents and visitors to Barrie to participate in the 37th-annual Promenade Days and ...
